section.name: Folders
section.description: All folders that are used in a Rapuma project or with Rapuma processes.

folder.name: Rapuma Configuration Folder
folder.description: The Rapuma configuration folder where all the XML default configuration files are kept.

folder.name: Rapuma Resource Folder
folder.description: The rapuma resource folder where various Rapuma system resources are kept.

folder.name: Rapuma Documentation Folder
folder.description: The Rapuma document docs folder where Rapuma documentation is kept.

folder.name: Rapuma XeTeX Folder
folder.description: XeTeX is run from within Rapuma and the executable and FMT file is located in this folder.

folder.name: Rapuma Resource Font Folder
folder.description: The Rapuma resource font folder where various Rapuma system resources are kept.

folder.name: Rapuma Resource Macro Folder
folder.description: The Rapuma resource macro folder where various Rapuma system resources are kept.

folder.name: Rapuma Resource Script Folder
folder.description: The Rapuma resource script folder where various Rapuma system resources are kept.

folder.name: Rapuma Resource Example Folder
folder.description: The Rapuma resource example folder where various Rapuma system resources are kept.

folder.name: Rapuma Resource Illustration Folder
folder.description: The Rapuma resource illustration folder where various Rapuma system resources are kept.

folder.name: User Rapuma Resource Folder
folder.description: The folder where the users keep various kinds of Rapuma resources.
folder.note: The userResouce folder comes from the local module the default setting is ~./local/share/rapuma/resource.

folder.name: User Archive Library Path
folder.description: Path to the local user archive library. This contains archives of past projects.
folder.note: This comes right from the config setting. There should always be something there, if only the default that is generated by the local module.

folder.name: User Backup Library Path
folder.description: Path to the local user backup folder. This contains project backups.
folder.note: This comes right from the config setting. There should always be something there, if only the default that is generated by the local module.

folder.name: User Font Library Path
folder.description: Path to the local user font library.
folder.note: This comes right from the config setting. There should always be something there, if only the default that is generated by the local module.

folder.name: User Illustrations Library Path
folder.description: Path to the local user illustration library.
folder.note: This comes right from the config setting. There should always be something there, if only the default that is generated by the local module.

folder.name: User Macro Library Path
folder.description: Path to the local user macro library. This contains varous user macros.
folder.note: This comes right from the config setting. There should always be something there, if only the default that is generated by the local module.

folder.name: User Scripts Library Path
folder.description: Path to the local user scripts library. This contains scripts for project text processing.
folder.note: This comes right from the config setting. There should always be something there, if only the default that is generated by the local module.

folder.name: User Template Library Path
folder.description: Path to the local user template library. This contains templates for creating new projects.
folder.note: This comes right from the config setting. There should always be something there, if only the default that is generated by the local module.

folder.name: User Cloud Storage Path
folder.description: Path to the local user cloud storage folder. This contains project data.
folder.note: This comes right from the config setting. There should always be something there, if only the default that is generated by the local module.

folder.name: Project Parent Default Folder
folder.description: The parent default folder this project could be located in.

folder.name: Project Parent Folder
folder.description: The parent folder this project is located in.

folder.name: Project Configuration Folder
folder.description: The project configuration folder where all configuration files are kept.

folder.name: Project Component Folder
folder.description: The folder were project components are kept.

folder.name: Project Component Group Folder
folder.description: The folder were project component group process information is kept.

folder.name: Project Deliverable Folder
folder.description: The folder were final rendered versions of project material goes. This folder will be backed up so data should always be safe in this location.

folder.name: Project Style Folder
folder.description: The folder were project style files are kept.

folder.name: Project TeX Extensions Folder
folder.description: The folder were project TeX extension files are kept.

folder.name: Project Script Folder
folder.description: The folder where all the project custom processing scripts are kept.

folder.name: Project Helper Script Folder
folder.description: The folder where all the project helper scripts are kept.

folder.name: Project Macro Folder
folder.description: The folder where all macro packages (or scripts) that drive the rendering process are kept.

folder.name: Project Macro Package Folder
folder.description: The folder where a specific macro package is found.

folder.name: Project Font Folder
folder.description: The folder where all the fonts for a project are kept.

folder.name: Project Hyphenation Folder
folder.description: The folder where hyphenation information files are kept.

folder.name: Project Illustration Folder
folder.description: The folder where project illustration files are kept.

section.name: Files
section.description: Key files created and used by Rapuma.

file.name: Macro Package XML Configuration File
file.description: The main XML configuration file for a macro package.

file.name: Project Macro Package Configuration File
file.description: The project macro package configuation file.

file.name: Rapuma Macro Package File Name
file.description: The Rapuma macro package file (Zipped).

file.name: Group TeX Link File
file.description: The file that links TeX to all the settings needed to render a job.

file.name: Group PDF Output File
file.description: The PDF output file that TeX produces from a group.

file.name: Pre-Style Extension File
file.description: This file contains TeX macro extentions. The extensions in this file need to be loaded before styles and style extensions are loaded.

file.name: Main Settings File
file.description: The main settings file that TeX will link to after the main macro file is loaded. These settings will add to or modify defaults set.

file.name: Settings Extension File
file.description: The settings extension file that TeX will link to after the main settings file is loaded. These settings will add to or modify previous settings.

file.name: Group Settings Extension File
file.description: The settings extension file that TeX will link to after the extensions settings file is loaded. These settings will add to or modify previous settings.

file.name: Global Styles
file.description: This is the file that contains all global style settings for the project.

file.name: Extension Styles
file.description: This is the file that contains all extension style settings for the project.

file.name: Group Styles
file.description: This is the file that contains all the style settings for the current group.

file.name: ParaTExt Project Source Hyphenation File
file.description: The source hypenation word list that is produced by ParaTExt.

file.name: TeX lccode Definition File
file.description: The TeX file that contains lccode definitions and is linked with the hypenation exclusions file.

file.name: Component Hyphenation Word List File
file.description: The file that contains the hypenation words that have been preprocessed and ready for the last step of being converted to a form useable by TeX.

file.name: TeX Group Hyphenation Exclusions File
file.description: The file that contains the hypenation words exclusions list for the current group that TeX will use to render the text.

file.name: ParaTExt Project Hyphenation Errors File
file.description: The file that list all the words that Rapuma could not deal with that are concidered errors.

file.name: Hyphenation Preprocess Script File
file.description: The script used to preprocess the ParaTExt hypenation word list (if necessary).

file.name: Rapuma Defalt Hyphenation Preprocess Script
file.description: The default hypenation preprocess script that is copied into the project when necessary.

file.name: Project ParaTExt Hyphenation File Copy
file.description: The publishing project copy of the source hypenation word list that is produced by ParaTExt. (Note: This file can be altered by preprocesses.)

file.name: Project ParaTExt Hyphenation File Backup Copy
file.description: A read-only backup of the ParaTExt source hypenation word list that is used for comparison purposes.

file.name: Group Preprocess Script File
file.description: The script used to preprocess the group (component) text. This is based on the component source ID which can be shared by multiple groups.

file.name: Rapuma Preprocess Script File
file.description: The default script stored in the Rapuma system that will be used to preprocess the group (component) text.
